name: Zombie Apocalypse Endless Shooter - Keep the Beat
name_original: Zombie Apocalypse Endless Shooter - Keep the Beat
description:
Zombie Shooter - Keep The Beat is a free to play Zombie survival game!

Try to survive among the zombies and kill the big boss!
You need to collect hearts in order to stay alive.

The game features:
- Easy Medium and Hard mode
- Endless zombie mode
- Different kind of weapons
- Collect hearts to get in Rage mode
- One Big Boss
